content: Requirement Capture: Allow users to input, categorize, and manage software requirements.
Requirements Versioning: Track and manage different versions of requirements to enable historical traceability.
Traceability Matrix Generation: Automatically generate a matrix that links requirements, test cases, and code artifacts.
Traceability Verification: Validate and ensure all requirements are linked to corresponding artifacts.
Impact Analysis: Analyze changes in requirements to identify affected artifacts and potential risk areas.
Change Notifications: Notify relevant stakeholders when a requirement change impacts linked items.
Automated Traceability Reports: Generate comprehensive reports on traceability coverage, gaps, and progress.
Collaboration and Feedback: Enable team members to comment on requirements, artifacts, and provide feedback in real-time.
